# Monthly Assault Counts 

```{r import1}
rawdata <- read_excel("../RawData/MonthlyAssaultCounts.xlsx") 
monthly <- rawdata %>% 
  mutate(month_year = my(Month)) %>% 
   select(-Notes,-Population,-"Crude Rate", -Month, -"Month Code") 
head(monthly)
```
